404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you're looking for could not be found.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

networkError.title: Network Error
networkError.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.

validationError.title: Validation Error
validationError.message: Some inputs are invalid. Please check the highlighted fields and try again.

authenticationError.title: Authentication Error
authenticationError.message: You are not authorized to access this resource. Please log in again.

authorizationError.title: Authorization Error
authorizationError.message: You do not have the necessary permissions to perform this action.

timeoutError.title: Timeout Error
timeoutError.message: The request took too long to process. Please try again later.

formSubmissionError.title: Form Submission Error
formSubmissionError.message: There was an error submitting the form. Please try again.

resourceNotFound.title: Resource Not Found
resourceNotFound.message: The requested resource could not be found.

passwordMismatch.title: Password Mismatch
passwordMismatch.message: The passwords entered do not match. Please check and try again.

accountLocked.title: Account Locked
accountLocked.message: Your account has been locked. Please contact support for assistance.

accountNotActivated.title: Account Not Activated
accountNotActivated.message: Your account has not been activated yet. Please check your email to activate your account.

invalidCredentials.title: Invalid Credentials
invalidCredentials.message: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

subscriptionExpired.title: Subscription Expired
subscriptionExpired.message: Your subscription has expired. Please renew to continue using the service.

paymentFailed.title: Payment Failed
paymentFailed.message: Payment could not be processed. Please try again with a different method.

duplicateEntry.title: Duplicate Entry
duplicateEntry.message: This entry already exists. Please use a different value.

quotaExceeded.title: Quota Exceeded
quotaExceeded.message: You have exceeded your quota. Please upgrade your plan or contact support.

fileUploadError.title: File Upload Error
fileUploadError.message: An error occurred while uploading the file. Please try again.

fileSizeExceeded.title: File Size Exceeded
fileSizeExceeded.message: The file size exceeds the allowed limit. Please upload a smaller file.

invalidFileType.title: Invalid File Type
invalidFileType.message: The selected file type is not supported. Please upload a valid file format.

databaseError.title: Database Error
databaseError.message: An error occurred while connecting to the database. Please try again later.

emailNotRegistered.title: Email Not Registered
emailNotRegistered.message: The email address entered is not associated with any account.

invalidToken.title: Invalid Token
invalidToken.message: The token provided is invalid or expired. Please request a new token.

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

serviceUnavailable.title: Service Unavailable
serviceUnavailable.message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

maintenanceMode.title: Maintenance Mode
maintenanceMode.message: The service is currently undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.

emailNotSent.title: Email Not Sent
emailNotSent.message: We could not send the email. Please check your connection and try again.

invalidInput.title: Invalid Input
invalidInput.message: The provided input is invalid. Please correct it and try again.

termsNotAccepted.title: Terms Not Accepted
termsNotAccepted.message: You must accept the terms and conditions to proceed.

actionFailed.title: Action Failed
actionFailed.message: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.

connectionLost.title: Connection Lost
connectionLost.message: The connection was lost. Attempting to reconnect...

reconnectionFailed.title: Reconnection Failed
reconnectionFailed.message: Failed to reconnect. Please refresh the page or check your connection.

unexpectedError.title: Unexpected Error
unexpectedError.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please refresh the page or try again later.
